PrecisAuthority for the Minister of Industry, Science and Technology to enter into an AGREEMENT that provides for the making of a loan of up to 30 million dollars to PWA Corporation in the event that he does not enter into the loan guarantee referred to in Order in Council P.C. 1992-2470.
